title: Triangulation Fraud
extract: Triangulation fraud, per the name, denotes that there are three individuals who play a role in the purchase of the order. ... A fraudulent seller who receives the order and then places the order for the actual product with a legitimate eCommerce website using a stolen credit card.Oct 14, 2015
